patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -2408,8 +2408,8 @@
 /* Source file https://github.com/MrOtherGuy/firefox-csshacks/tree/master/chrome/tabs_fill_available_width.css made available under Mozilla Public License v. 2.0
 See the above repository for updates as well as full license text. */
 
 /* Why 100vw? Tab closing requires width animation to end and "none" can't be animated */
-/*
+
 .tabbrowser-tab[fadein]:not([style^="max-width"]) {
   max-width: 100vw !important
\ No newline at end of file
-}*/
+}
\ No newline at end of file

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -2407,9 +2407,9 @@
 
 /* Source file https://github.com/MrOtherGuy/firefox-csshacks/tree/master/chrome/tabs_fill_available_width.css made available under Mozilla Public License v. 2.0
 See the above repository for updates as well as full license text. */
 
-/* Why 100vw? Tab closing requires width animation to end and "none" can't be animated */
+/* Why 100vw? Tab closing requires width animation to end and "none" can't be animated *
 
 .tabbrowser-tab[fadein]:not([style^="max-width"]) {
   max-width: 100vw !important
\ No newline at end of file
-}
+}*/
\ No newline at end of file

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1165,9 +1165,9 @@
       var(--identity-tab-color)) !important;
 }
 
 /* Need to use FILTER dro shadow fo ouline so it is a circle */
-/*rework en la Linea de Contenedores-BordeFavicon*
+/*rework en la Linea de Contenedores-BordeFavicon*/
 .tab-icon-pending:not([selected], [pinned]),
 .tab-icon-pending:not([pinned]),
 .tab-sharing-icon-overlay:not([selected], [pinned]),
 .tab-throbber[busy],
